content: Can you describe the project a bit more?
add an image replacing the logo of a platform
Great, I'm on it! Replacing the logo with the new image.

{"status": "success", "qna": [{"question 1": "What is the preferred size and resolution for the new image?", "option1": "Keep it as the current logo size and resolution.", "option2": "Specify a new size and resolution."}, {"question 2": "Should the new image maintain the original color scheme and branding aesthetics of the platform, or are we looking for a completely new design direction?", "option1": "Maintain the current color scheme and branding aesthetics.", "option2": "Introduce a new design direction."}], "input_token_count": 300, "output_token_count": 113, "time_taken": "0:00:02.677843"}

replace the logo image with the image of a computer
Got it, I will replace the logo image with a computer image.
